leave_policy: Employees are entitled to 20 paid leaves annually.
overtime_policy: Overtime is paid at 1.5x the regular hourly rate.
work_hours: Regular work hours are 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday.
dress_code: Smart casual attire is required from Monday to Thursday. Fridays are casual dress days.
remote_work: Employees can work remotely up to 2 days per week with manager approval.
